__e: It can be held with one hand by a lone driver, it has a large magazine, and in the hands of a marksman, it's quite accurate at close range.
Griff has only got half a magazine and he can hardly move.
This happens to be a style from a magazine.
This magazine is one of the last reasons that men still read.
Not that this isn't a great magazine, it's just... it's not the kind of writing that I should be doing.
You have a gun and a magazine with 13 ammo hidden in your body.
The next time we meet, I'd like you to bring a magazine article... that you find particularly interesting.
And you don't think I'd be featured in the pages of Hunks Quarterly?
